name: read_posts
description: Fetch the latest posts from a specified Twitter/X user with configurable options for replies and retweets

arguments.name: username
arguments.desc: The Twitter/X username (without @) to fetch posts from

arguments.name: count
arguments.desc: Number of tweets to fetch (default: 20, max: 100)

arguments.name: includeReplies
arguments.desc: Whether to include replies in the results (default: false)

arguments.name: includeRetweets
arguments.desc: Whether to include retweets in the results (default: true)

name: create_post
description: Create a new post on Twitter/X with text content and automatic validation

arguments.name: text
arguments.desc: The text content of the tweet (max 280 characters)

name: get_post
description: Retrieve a specific tweet by its unique ID with full metadata

arguments.name: tweetId
arguments.desc: The unique ID of the tweet to retrieve

name: search_posts
description: Search for tweets matching a query with filtering and sorting options

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: The search query string to match against tweets

arguments.name: count
arguments.desc: Number of search results to return (default: 10, max: 100)

arguments.name: resultType
arguments.desc: Type of results to return: 'recent' or 'popular' (default: recent)
